description:
Ichidaiji Tooru is an aspiring magician and illusionist. When he was 18, he met a legendary magic performer from Holywood James Barnon. Tooru impressed him enough, that he agreed to take him as his apprentice when he will reach 20.
Unfortunately when Tooru reached this age, while trying to save Yuumi from car accident, he injured his right hand. It took him eight years to fully recuperate. Now he is ready to try again.
name: Ichidaiji Tooru
